title: Elon Musk Foments More Geopolitical Controversy With Ukraine Internet Dispute
description: The world’s richest man, whose Starlink internet service is critical to the Ukrainian Army, said he could not “indefinitely” fund the system’s use in Ukraine.
dc:creator: Cade Metz, Cassandra Vinograd and Helene Cooper
category: United States Defense and Military Forces
media:description: Elon Musk, the founder of SpaceX, provided Ukraine with Starlink internet service at the start of the war with Russia. Now, it’s not clear if his company will continue to fund that service.
